name: Bounce Knight - Demo version
description:
(DEMO VERSION v.1.1)

Delve into the lair of the Peckomancer and overcome his gauntlet of traps, trials, tricks and army of the undead.

As Bounce Knight you must master each level loaded with traps, enemies and loot with the aid of your trusty sword which can be swung, thrown and most importantly, propel you into hard to reach spots.

-Explore the  undead fortress and find all its secrets-

-Unlock new skins and weapons.-

-Time trial runs to unlock new gear.-

-Find unlikely allies and complete quests.-

Defeat the Pekomancer and save your friends.

...Coming to full release 2020.

Controls:

'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' /  Arrows Keys - Move / Jump.

Left Click - Throw Sword.

Right Click - Attack/Interact.

Middle Click - Recall Sword.

' R ' - Restart Level.

-Controller supported-
